# iru_device_action_renew_mdm_profile (Action)

Renews the MDM profile on a specific device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
action "iru_device_action_renew_mdm_profile" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
}
```

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.
